column4: Can someone please help me with playing a DVD in ubuntu? I should be easy, and yet for some reason I cannot seem to get one to play correctly no matter what I do.
plug your DVD into the drive, totem should appear and there you go.
if only it were that easy
what problems are you having ?
Totem says it cannot play the DVD (I've tried two). I have also tried playing them in mplayer, VLC, Ogle... probably another I'm forgetting
can you pastebin the exact message ?. Can you play the VOB files directly with totem/mplayer ?
it should be that easy with a fresh Feisty installation.
I did a fresh feisty...
can you pastebin the exact message ?. Can you play the VOB files directly with totem/mplayer ?
one sec
what do you mean when you say pastebin?
I'm trying to bring up the error again... it's sort of locking up
or at least taking a while
take your time.
ok... got it
if I try to start totem with the DVD in, it locks up and I have to force quit
I have to start it, then put the DVD in and it says "An error occurred. Could not read from resource."
can totem play the VOBs files ?
will try that now
I tried the VOB directly and same error
on one of the players, it started to play the intro and crashed, but I forget which player
no further suggestion, sorry, I've got no regioned-DVD at the moment.
